string.name: parse_error
string.comment: Title parsing error for Youtube etc

string.name: scrobble_ignored
string.comment: Will be prefixed by Lastfm: (e.g. Lastfm: Scrobble ignored)

resources.string: Lastfm zignorował edycję prawdopodobnie dlatego, że scrobble jest zbyt stary. Czy chcesz zapisać tę edycję dla przyszłych scrobbli?

string.name: required_fields_empty
string.comment: Shown on filling a form

resources.string: Nie wszystkie wymagane pola zostały wypełnione

string.name: top_artists
string.comment: Top artists the user has listened to

string.name: artist_channel
string.comment: Artist or youtube channel

string.name: top_albums
string.comment: top albums the user has listened to, or most scrobbled albums of an artist

string.name: top_tracks
string.comment: top tracks the user has listened to, or most scrobbled tracks of an artist

string.name: similar
string.comment: Similar tracks but in short

string.name: artist_title
string.comment: $artist — $title

string.name: recents
string.comment: Short for recently scrobbled

string.name: first_scrobbled_on
string.comment: %1= date

string.name: auto
string.comment: automatic or default setting

string.name: almost_there
string.comment: Shown on the first screen after install, asking the user to complete the setup

string.name: other_apps
string.comment: Apps which are not music players or video streaming apps

string.name: scrobble_services
string.comment: Services like lastfm, librefm, listenbrainz etc

string.name: recents_share
string.comment: %1= artist — track, %2= relative time (with preposition e.g. on Sep 9)

string.name: recents_share_username
string.comment: %1= artist — track, %2= relative time (with preposition e.g. on Sep 9), %3= username

string.name: charts_share
string.comment: %1= time period (e.g. 3 months, monthly), %2= top artists/albums/tracks, %3= list of artists/albums/tracks

string.name: charts_share_username
string.comment: %1= time period (e.g. 3 months, monthly), %2= top artists/albums/tracks, %3= list of artists/albums/tracks, %4= username

string.name: legend
string.comment: Chart legend - descriptions of the symbols used

string.name: rank_change
string.comment: %1= delta change

string.name: library
string.comment: search within the library

string.name: global
string.comment: search globally across lastfm

resources.string: Użyj tego tylko wtedy, gdy edytowałeś lub usunąłeś scrobble ze strony internetowej.

string.name: searched_n_items
string.comment: %1= number of tracks/albums/artists, always greater than 1000

resources.string: Przeszukano %1$s najlepszych pozycji w każdej kategorii.

string.name: last_indexed
string.comment: %1= date

string.name: item_options
string.comment: Screen reader text for 3 dots menu button

string.name: new_player
string.comment: (%1 = App name) detected (shown in notification, when a new music player is detected)

resources.string: Czy chcesz scrobblować przez tę aplikację?
Ten utwór nie ma strony na lastFM
Nie ma jeszcze znajomych z lastFM…

string.name: n_more
string.comment: n more( pending scrobbles)

resources.string: Potrzebne do pobierania metadanych muzyki. Nie czytamy żadnych powiadomień

string.name: authenticate_with_lastfm
string.comment: Login with last.fm

resources.string: LibreFM, GNUFM i Listenbrainz mogą być uwierzytelniane później, w ustawieniach

string.name: swap
string.comment: (Swap title and artist)

string.name: based_on
string.comment: %1= the word 'artists', 'albums' or 'tracks'

string.name: not_enough_data
string.comment: (not enough data to draw a chart etc)

string.name: charts_num_text
string.comment: %1= number, %2= List text (e.g. 1. Text)

string.name: random
string.comment: Displays a random scrobble or a loved track of the user
